function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unanimous implementation of solutions not achieved in Organisations A and C","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation due to lack of consistent measures","Mitigation":"Facilitate collaboration and communication to ensure consistent implementation of health and safety protocols","Technologies":"Collaboration tools, communication platforms","People":"Staff members, visitors, and clients","Owner":"Senior management, HR department, health and safety team"},{"Description":"Limited work from home periods for employees during lockdown","Impact":"Increased potential for disease spread as employees return to the office environment","Mitigation":"Implement flexible work arrangements and staggered office attendance to reduce the number of employees present at a given time","Technologies":"Remote work software, employee scheduling tools","People":"HR department, management, employees","Owner":"HR department, management"},{"Description":"Lack of preparedness for unexpected outbreaks such as COVID-19","Impact":"Inability to effectively support staff and mitigate disease spread in the workplace","Mitigation":"Develop and implement comprehensive response plans for unexpected outbreaks, including contagious diseases","Technologies":"Crisis management software, communication tools","People":"Health and safety team, senior management, HR department","Owner":"Health and safety team"}]}
